about_the_game:
A rare gift package designed specifically for beginners, which can significantly enhance your combat and survival abilities, making you more confident in the early stages of your adventure. We have specially prepared a rich beginner gift package, including valuable resources such as wings, diamonds, coins, equipment boxes, potions, etc., to provide sufficient logistical support for your character's growth and help you quickly improve your strength. The package includes:


Newcomer gift package content:
Character Wings x 1
Diamond x 3680
Gold coin x 500000
Dark Gold Equipment Box x 5
Golden jewelry box x 5
Large blood bottle x 10

Receive the novice gift pack and embark on a thrilling adventure. In this world full of unknowns and dangers, only the bravest and wisest heroes can stand out and become legends!

Usage

After installing the novice gift pack DLC, enter the store interface, click on the DLC category bar in the bottom left corner, and then click to claim the gift pack.

short_description: Our Starter package is designed for warriors embarking on their first journey, designed to help every player easily integrate into the game and grow quickly.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Vietnamese, Korean
